title: Unable to access profile page in client?
body:
I'm not sure if this is just me, but I've found that since 5.8, when coming out of game, I've been unable to access my profile via the button in the upper right. I believe that every time it's happened, I've come out of an ARAM, but I haven't played much SR recently to know if it's an issue specific to ARAM.

What seems to be happening (or not happening) is that, now, on the home page in the client, I click on the profile button and nothing happens. The store button seems to work just fine, as do the help and options buttons.

This is somewhat of a non-issue from a legitimate requirement to play standpoint, but is something that probably does need addressing as a bugfix post 5.9 deploy.

replies.body:
In patch 5.8, I believe, is when they introduced the reworked profile page. It may be that your computer is not really liking that. Have you tried repairing your client?

What OS are you on, and what graphics card do you have?

Well it's not really much of an issue because it doesn't stop me from playing. As such, I didn't really see the necessity in repairing my client. I just thought it was worth pointing it out as a bug.

That said, I'm on Windows 7 with both an Intel HD 4000 and NVIDIA Quadro K2000M (yay laptops)

laptops op

I'm not exactly understanding this now. If you can't access your runes/mastery pages/item sets, that would have a severe handicap on your game-play. What exactly can and can't you do on your profile? Could you upload some screenshots?

Of course this is just out of curiosity, so if you can't be bothered, no worries.
